death.attack.aerial_collapse: %1$s could not resist too much air pressure
death.attack.blackout: %1$s moved too fast while in blackout
death.attack.gametechbcs_spellbooks.null: %1$s got Nullflare blasted whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.nullflare_fire.player: %1$s got cooked whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.nullflare_ice.player: %1$s got cryo frozen whilst trying to escape %2$s
effect.gametechbcs_spellbooks.aerial_col: Causes the affected entity to fly and crash down, dealing percentage-based damage to their health, ignoring armor.
effect.gametechbcs_spellbooks.assassin.d: Grants true invisibility, greatly increases movement speed and attack damage. The effect is removed after the first attack.
effect.gametechbcs_spellbooks.astral_sen: Alert the player about incoming projectiles, targeting and approaching entities.
Helps the player to find chests, traps, and valuable blocks.
effect.gametechbcs_spellbooks.blackout.d: Affected get their everything suppressed for the entire duration, they can only melee attack.
effect.gametechbcs_spellbooks.corroded.d: Reduces resistance to fire spells and corrodes armor.
effect.gametechbcs_spellbooks.flames_reb: Ignite a wave of fire, marking your place in time. If you fall, the flames will resurrect you at your marked spot, fully restoring your health.
effect.gametechbcs_spellbooks.frozen_sig: Fixes the entity’s vision at the point they were looking when the effect took hold. Also disables certain player abilities.
effect.gametechbcs_spellbooks.hemorrhage: Reduces holy resistance and amplifies spell power at the cost of losing health with each spell cast.
effect.gametechbcs_spellbooks.lingering_: Splits incoming burst damage into four parts, dealt over 8 seconds instead of instantly.
effect.gametechbcs_spellbooks.meteor_sto: Summons Magic fireballs to rain down from the sky.
effect.gametechbcs_spellbooks.nullflare_: Deals damage-over-time to the affected entity.
Slows and chills the affected entity.
effect.gametechbcs_spellbooks.reversal.d: Reverses any incoming damage. Additionally, it can copy incoming projectiles.
effect.gametechbcs_spellbooks.spectral_b: After 3 seconds, teleports the affected entity to the entity they were looking at, passing through any blocks.
effect.gametechbcs_spellbooks.third_pers: Forces the affected player to switch to third person perspective. Switches back to first person when effect ends.
item.gametechbcs_spellbooks.amulet_of_sp: Can be found inside Ancient City treasure chests.
Spectral Blink teleports targeted entity to your location while crouching
quote.gametechbcs_spellbooks.flames_rebo: The fire grants you another chance...
The inferno restores what was lost...
The blaze does not yield, and neither shall you...
spell.gametechbcs_spellbooks.acid_rain.g: A toxic downpour that strips all positive effects from enemies caught within. The rain corrodes all entities inside, weakening their armor and reducing their fire resistance.
spell.gametechbcs_spellbooks.aerial_coll: Inflict an effect that lifts enemies into the air for 2.5 seconds before crushing them down to the floor, dealing percentage-based damage to their health. The damage dealt ignores any kind of damage cap.
spell.gametechbcs_spellbooks.ashen_breat: Exhale a cloud of darkening ash, damaging and blinding creatures in its reach.
spell.gametechbcs_spellbooks.astral_sens: Reveals the pathfinder of nearby entities in a radius. Normal casting alerts the caster about nearby threats, while crouch casting helps sense loot, traps, and valuables like Myt.
spell.gametechbcs_spellbooks.banish.guid: Unleash a powerful cleansing force that eradicates harmful effects, shatters enemy beneficial effects, revitalizes the caster, and banish dark entities to oblivion.
spell.gametechbcs_spellbooks.blackout.gu: Creates a lingering anti-magic field that suppresses abilities within its radius. Players caught in the zone are unable to cast spells, use items, or place blocks. Moving within the field inflicts damage. Can only be obtained by defeating the Enraged Dead King.
spell.gametechbcs_spellbooks.call_forth_: Summons an Enraged Dead King boss to challenge you. Defeating it grants a higher chance of obtaining high-quality loot, including the exclusive spell Blackout. The Enraged Dead King can cast additional powerful spells.
spell.gametechbcs_spellbooks.crimson_dow: A blood rain that damages all enemies within for 7sec, lifestealing 12% of the damage dealt. Everyone caught in the rain are afflicted with Hemorrhage, reducing their holy resistance and amplifying spell power at the cost of losing health with each spell cast.
spell.gametechbcs_spellbooks.displacemen: Teleports nearby entities to the opposite direction of where they are looking.
spell.gametechbcs_spellbooks.ensnare.gui: Create an area of effect field that charges for 3 seconds before rooting all entities within it for a set duration.
spell.gametechbcs_spellbooks.flames_rebo: Ignite a wave of fire, marking your place in time. If you fall, the flames will resurrect you at your marked spot, restoring you to the health you had when it was cast.
spell.gametechbcs_spellbooks.lingering_s: Grants a effect; During that any burst damage you get will be split into 4 different smaller damage and will be dealt over time giving the caster time to recover.
spell.gametechbcs_spellbooks.message.ast: ⚠ A tripwire trap is attached nearby!
spell.gametechbcs_spellbooks.meteor_stor: Summons Magic fireballs to rain down from the sky.
spell.gametechbcs_spellbooks.nullflare.g: Cast to inflict Nullflare Ice on enemies, or Crouch Cast to inflict Nullflare Fire; when Ice meets Fire, or vice versa, it triggers a Nullflare Blast, dealing damage. Additional effect stacks increase the Blast damage.
spell.gametechbcs_spellbooks.psychic_bol: Select multiple targets on cast. On recast end, fires small projectiles that confuse targets on hit, making them prioritize attacking nearby non-player entities.
spell.gametechbcs_spellbooks.reversal.gu: Reverses any incoming damage with increased power. Additionally, it can copy incoming projectiles.
spell.gametechbcs_spellbooks.reversal.wa: You need a suitable weapon to cast Reversal!
spell.gametechbcs_spellbooks.shatterpoin: Send forth a chilling blast that shatters on impact, striking all entities within its area of effect.
spell.gametechbcs_spellbooks.spectral_bl: After activation, the caster has 3 seconds. During this time, they can teleport to any entity they are looking at, even through walls. Any entities within the teleportation range will be revealed to the caster.
spell.gametechbcs_spellbooks.tidal_slash: Requires Trident Of The Eternal Maelstrom to cast this spell!
ui.gametechbcs_spellbooks.nullflare.addi: Spell's damage is further enhanced by Ice and Fire spell power.
